meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The contestants lined up at the starting line.
meanings.sent2: The contestants were all eager to win the race.
meanings.sent3: The contestants wore colorful costumes to stand out.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the contestants are always striving to be the best.
meanings.sent5: The contestants practiced diligently to improve their skills.

meanings.sent1: All the contestants were excited to showcase their talents.
meanings.sent3: The contestants' teamwork led them to victory.
meanings.sent4: The contestants' determination was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The contestants' efforts paid off with a well-deserved win.
